item.title: Ask a Flooder 13: How do you do mobile load testing?
item.description: Originally posted here. How do you load test a native mobile app? I discuss the general approach to mobile load testing, what a device farm is, and why a device farm isn’t necessary for load testing. I also discuss the best mobile load testing tools to use. Or listen to the audio version here: Hi everyone, Nicole here again, back with another Ask a Flooder, and today’s question is:
